creator.description:
Marks backdated posts - i.e. posts where the creation date does not match the time they first showed up on the firehose

Run by @samuel.bsky.team

locales.description: This post's self-identified creation timestamp does not match the time that it first appeared on the firehose. This may be because it's an imported archival post from a service like BlueArk, or it might be misleading.
locales.name: Backdated post

locales.description: This post was made by a time traveller (or, more likely, was submitted with an incorrect creation date)
locales.name: Post from the future
